00027 /*! \file powspec_fitsio.h
00028  *  Copyright (C) 2003-2013 Max-Planck-Society
00029  *  \author Martin Reinecke

00031 
00032 #ifndef POWSPEC_FITSIO_H
00033 #define POWSPEC_FITSIO_H
00034 
00035 #include <string>
00036 
00037 class fitshandle;
00038 class PowSpec;
00039 
00040 /*! \defgroup powspec_fitsio_group FITS-based I/O of power spectra */
00041 /*! \{ */
00042 
00043 /*! Reads the power spectrum stored in the FITS binary table pointed to by
00044     \a inp into \a powspec. */
00045 void read_powspec_from_fits (fitshandle &inp, PowSpec &powspec, int nspecs,
00046   int lmax);
00047 /*! Opens the FITS file \a filename, jumps to HDU \a hdunum, and reads \a nspecs
00048     columns into \a powspec. \a nspecs must be 1, 4, or 6. */
00049 void read_powspec_from_fits (const std::string &infile,
00050   PowSpec &powspec, int nspecs, int lmax, int hdunum=2);
00051 
00052 /*! Inserts a new binary table into \a out, which contains \a nspecs columns
00053     of FITS type TDOUBLE, and writes the components of \a powspec into it.
00054     \a nspecs must be 1, 4, or 6. */
00055 void write_powspec_to_fits (fitshandle &out,
00056   const PowSpec &powspec, int nspecs);
00057 /*! Creates a new FITS file called \a outfile, inserts a binary table,
00058     which contains \a nspecs columns of FITS type TDOUBLE, and writes the
00059     components of \a powspec into it. \a nspecs must be 1, 4, or 6. */
00060 void write_powspec_to_fits (const std::string &outfile,
00061   const PowSpec &powspec, int nspecs);
00062 
00063 /*! \} */
00064 
00065 #endif
